text: The Metropolitan City of Messina is a metropolitan city in Sicily, Italy. Its capital is the city of Messina. It replaced the Province of Messina. It includes the city of Messina and 107 other municipalities (comuni). 277,584 people lived there in 2014. The nearby Aeolian Islands is also part of the Metropolitan City of Messina. title: Metropolitan City of Messina
